claimEarnings().details: Conic pool LP tokens need to be staked in the `LpTokenStaker` in order to receive a share of the CRV, CVX and CNC earnings. after selling all extra reward tokens.
claimEarnings().notice: Claims all CRV, CVX and CNC earned by a user. All extra reward tokens earned will be sold for CNC.

claimPoolEarningsAndSellRewardTokens().notice: Claims all claimable CVX and CRV from Convex for all staked Curve LP tokens. Then Swaps all additional rewards tokens for CNC.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

poolCheckpoint().notice: Updates the internal fee accounting state. Returns `true` if rewards were claimed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
